title: Calories in 1 Tbsp Sugar
meta_description: Discover calories in tbsp sugar, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with quick tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Granulated white table sugar; 1 tbsp ≈12 g; no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by sugar type, brand, packing density, and measurement accuracy. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of granulated sugar contains about 49 kcal, all from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Powdered sugar (slightly less dense, per tbsp)
Add to black coffee (no other changes)

faqs.q: How many calories in tbsp sugar?
faqs.a: About 49 kcal for 1 tablespoon of granulated white sugar.
Yes, 1 tbsp sugar is nearly 100% carbs (12.6 g), all simple sugars.

faqs.q: Calories in brown sugar vs white?
faqs.a: Brown sugar has slightly more at ~51 kcal per tbsp due to molasses.

faqs.q: Does sugar have protein or fat?
faqs.a: No—pure sugar provides 0 g protein and 0 g fat per tbsp.

faqs.q: How much sugar is too much daily?
faqs.a: Limit added sugars to <25-36 g/day (2-3 tbsp) per health guidelines.
